document.full_text: daniel sedin was among the three finalists named for the hart memorial trophy thursday, giving him a chance to capture the most valuable player award a year after his twin brother and vancouver team mate won the sport's highest individual honor.
document.title: canucks' sedin in running to keep hart trophy in the family
lines_and_colors: daniel sedin was among the three finalists named for the hart memorial trophy thursday, giving him a chance to capture the most valuable player award a year after his twin brother and vancouver team mate won the sport's highest individual honor.
